About Me

Hello I'm Amanulla Khan. I'm a full-stack web developer.

BIO

I'm a Front-End Developer for Tata Consultancy Services in Kolkata, India. I have serious passion for UI effects, animations and creating intuitive, dynamic user experiences. Let's make something special.

TCS

Front End Developer

I worked as a front end developer for one US client. I worked on Angularjs, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, ExtJS, Sencha Touch for dynamic UI development.
